original_title: LANDSCAPE HOVEL PICTURE FUN: The little boy with a knife / Beyond the slope of a small hill (a pastoral scene)
overview: Ensnared in quarreling modes of appearing, and disappearing – between biography, philosophy, and death – Landscape Hovel Picture Fun is dedicated to the story of the day that never comes – which of course, is a day that comes, but never in time. The angel of animation is governed by the lives that enter its domain, and the mysteries that populate its perimeter: Art is a continuation of life by other means.
title: LANDSCAPE HOVEL PICTURE FUN: The little boy with a knife / Beyond the slope of a small hill (a pastoral scene)
